checkbox.ariaLabel: to include the book %{bookTitle} in the export

bookReadersTooltip.label:
Selecting the "readers" option will export only the chosen readers.

This is useful for adding specific readers to a device that already has the book installed but lacks these readers.

audioOnly.label: readers
audioOnly.ariaLabel: only export the reader information for book %{bookTitle}

checkbox.ariaLabel: to include the reader %{readerDisplayName} in the export
